title: Positive-ionic mobility and a hierarchy of ions in normal liquid 3He.
abstract: We have measured positive-ion mobilities in liquid 3He down to 3 mK. At 5 bar the low temperature mobility is given by mu = (0.17 - 4.41 lnT) x 10^-6 m^2/Vs. At 27 bar two mobilities are seen, mufast= (-12.85 - 6.21 lnT) x 10^-6 m^2/Vs and muslow = (-6.26 - 3.64 lnT) x 10^-6 m2/Vs. At temperatures near the discontinuity we see multiple mobilities and time-dependent conversion from one species of ion to another

        Positive-ionic mobility and a hierarchy of ions in normal liquid 3He.</dc:title><dc:creator>
        Alexander, P. W.</dc:creator><dc:creator>
        Barber, C. N.</dc:creator><dc:creator>
        McClintock, Peter V. E.</dc:creator><dc:creator>
        Piockett, G. R.</dc:creator><dc:subject>
        QC Physics</dc:subject><dc:description>
        We have measured positive-ion mobilities in liquid 3He down to 3 mK. At 5 bar the low temperature mobility is given by mu = (0.17 - 4.41 lnT) x 10^-6 m^2/Vs. At 27 bar two mobilities are seen, mufast= (-12.85 - 6.21 lnT) x 10^-6 m^2/Vs and muslow = (-6.26 - 3.64 lnT) x 10^-6 m2/Vs. At temperatures near the discontinuity we see multiple mobilities and time-dependent conversion from one species of ion to another.</dc:description><dc:date>

        http://dx.doi.org/10.1103/PhysRevLett.39.1544</dc:relation><dc:identifier>
        Alexander, P. W. and Barber, C. N. and McClintock, Peter V. E. and Piockett, G. R. (1977) Positive-ionic mobility and a hierarchy of ions in normal liquid 3He. Physical Review Letters, 39 (24). pp. 1544-1547. ISSN 1079-7114</dc:identifier><dc:relation>
